description.narrative: Aus4Reform', will enable the Australian Government to continue to work with the Vietnamese Government to boost productivity and competitiveness in Vietnam. The program will support the development of quality policies, laws, and institutions through advocacy, consultation, and by strengthening the evidence base for economic policies - drawing on international experience and expertise, especially from Australia. Aus4Reform will contribute directly to two of the three pillars under Australia's Vietnam Aid Investment Plan (AIP): Pillar 1 on enabling and engaging the private sector for development and Pillar 3 on women's economic empowerment. As Australia continues to transition its relationship with Vietnam from development cooperation to an economic partnership, Aus4Reform will be important in this transition.
